title: Last Orders
synopsis: The 60-second film features six fierce samurai who rush through a post-futuristic megalopolis using the most unpredictable means of transport (including a kite!) as to make it on time for the last order at their favorite pub.
staff: [['Kitakubo, Hiroyuki', ['Director', ' Storyboard', ' Key Animation']], ['Ogura, Hiromasa', ['Art Director']], ['Kise, Kazuchika', ['Key Animation', ' Animation Director', ' Character Design']], ['Takeuchi, Atsushi', ['Layout']]]
